content: निबुध् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To know, understand, learn; निबोध साधो तव चेत्कुतूहलं <ls>Ku. 5. 52</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 14</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 68</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To regard or consider as, deem. {@--3@} To listen or attend to. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To explain, inform, acquaint.
